home.title: WitValley Laser - Provider of Laser Intelligent Equipment Solutions for PV Modules

hero.title:
Laser Intelligent Equipment for PV Modules
Comprehensive Solution Provider
hero.desc: Focused on the application research of electrode interconnection technology and the R&D and manufacturing of high-end laser micro-nano processing intelligent equipment, providing leading packaging and welding equipment solutions for the photovoltaic industry

mainProducts.title: Core Product Display
mainProducts.desc: WitValley Laser's core products provide efficient and intelligent solutions for PV module production

clients.title: Cooperative Clients
clients.desc: WitValley Laser's products and services have been recognized and trusted by many leading enterprises in the industry

about.title: About WitValley Laser
about.desc: Suzhou WitValley Laser Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. was established in 2019, focusing on the application research of electrode interconnection technology and the R&D and manufacturing of high-end laser micro-nano processing intelligent equipment

products.title: Product Catalog
products.desc: With advanced technology and innovation capabilities, WitValley Laser provides a variety of high-performance laser intelligent equipment for the photovoltaic industry

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions or needs, please feel free to contact us.

mainProduct.title: Cell Interconnection Integrated Machine (WV-3500C)
mainProduct.desc: Cell Interconnection Integrated Machine (Comprehensive welding platform covering HJT/TOPcon/PERC/Perovskite Tandem, pioneering OBB strip film technology)

feature0.title: High Performance
feature0.desc: Adopts PC-Base control system, reconfigurable I/O interface and customized system integration, intelligent control core builds high-performance automation platform

feature1.title: High Precision
feature1.desc: Sub-micron repeat positioning accuracy (±0.5μm), high-resolution linear motor drive unit, temperature drift real-time compensation module, high-precision servo control architecture

overview.title: Leading Packaging and Welding Equipment Supplier in the PV Industry

rndBase.title: R&D & Production Base
rndBase.desc: The company has an 8,000-square-meter R&D and production site, with an annual assembly and delivery capacity of over 1,000 sets of equipment, providing stable production capacity guarantee for customers.

team.title: Professional Team
team.desc: With more than 180 employees, R&D and technical personnel account for 35%, owning a senior R&D team in the industry and cultivating a number of key technical personnel in laser welding process.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.desc: Based on professional technical accumulation and independent innovation R&D concept, we are committed to creating a new track of high-end laser equipment for new energy electrode interconnection and promoting the technological progress of the industry.

vision.title: Corporate Vision
vision.desc: To become the most valuable laser equipment company

mission.title: Corporate Mission
mission.desc: Practitioner of laser equipment technology innovation and application

timeline.title: Development History
timeline.2020: Launched R&D of first junction box automatic installation machine AZ01A
timeline.2021: 18S Busbar Laminating Welder WV-DN200 R&D Successful
timeline.2022: AZ200 R&D Successful and Introduced to Customer Production
timeline.2024: Rated as Suzhou Unicorn Cultivation Enterprise

1.title: National High-Tech Enterprise
1.desc: Certified in 2021, marking the company's national-level R&D capabilities and technological innovation

2.title: Jiangsu Province Specialized, Refined, Characteristic and Novel SME
2.desc: Certified in 2024, reflecting the company's technical strength and market competitiveness in professional fields

3.title: Suzhou Unicorn Cultivation Enterprise
3.desc: Rated in 2024, representing the company's high growth potential and innovation capability as an industry benchmark

4.title: Suzhou Engineering Technology Research Center
4.desc: Established based on the company, focusing on engineering technology research and industrialization in the field of laser intelligent equipment

5.title: 208 Authorized Patents
5.desc: Including 28 invention patents, demonstrating the company's core technical strength in laser equipment

6.title: 12 Software Copyrights
6.desc: Covering laser equipment control systems, automation management software and other fields, showing the company's software R&D capabilities

WV-3500C.name: Busbar-Free Electrode Interconnection Machine(WV-3500C)
technicalPerformance: High Performance: Adopts PC-Base control system, reconfigurable I/O interface and customized system integration, and builds a high-performance automation platform with an intelligent control center

High Precision: Submicron repeat positioning accuracy (±0.5μm), high-resolution linear motor drive unit, and high-precision servo control architecture with real-time temperature drift compensation module
Battery Compatibility: Compatible with 182-210 specification HJT/TOPcon/PERC/perovskite tandem cells

productParameters.Compatible Adhesive Film Specification: Film material: Modified EVA/POE/TPO (or equivalent low fluidity material film); also compatible with Pet with back glue; Roll outer diameter: 450mm (online automatic material change available); Roll inner diameter: 76 mm; Film strip width: 2.8-6mm; Front and back film: Different films can be used for front and back sides

WV-TM100A.name: Busbarless Electrode Interconnection Machine (WV-TM100A)
technicalPerformance: High Speed: Highly customized system integration, based on PC-Base control system with fast response speed
Smart Interconnection: Intelligent data classification and AI data analysis
Battery Compatibility: Compatible with 182-210 specification HJT/TOPcon/PERC/perovskite tandem cells
Integrates multiple processes, detection and data tracking systems to realize production, detection and judgment in one, ensuring product yield during manufacturing

productParameters.Compatible Adhesive Film Specification: Film material: Modified EVA/POE/TPO (or equivalent low fluidity material film); also compatible with Pet with back glue; Roll outer diameter: 450mm (online automatic material change available); Roll inner diameter: 76 mm; Film strip width: 2.8-6mm; Front and back film: Different films can be used for front and back sides

WV-AZ400.name: Junction Box Installation All-in-One Machine (WV-AZ400)
technicalPerformance: High equipment stability: Backplane gluing controlled by independent PLC, streamline transmission controlled independently, one-click switch to straight-through mode
Self-developed vision control system to accurately realize junction box positioning and judge the installation effect of junction box

Multi-functional visual inspection, including busbar posture, teflon cloth and tape status, glue path detection, junction box installation condition judgment, and junction box installation and pressing effect detection
Unordered feeding, can be connected with AGV and overhead shuttle to realize unmanned intellectualization

WV-AJ100.name: Lead Lifting & Backplane Gluing All-in-One Machine (WV-AJ100)
technicalPerformance: Self-developed vision system for accurate detection of incoming material status, guided positioning and finished product inspection
Integrates automatic lead lifting and straightening, high-temperature cloth tearing, ironing and recycling functions
Synchronous operation of multiple box leads with high cycle time, high speed and high efficiency

WV-AZ500A.name: Backplane Gluing & Junction Box Installation All-in-One Machine (WV-AZ500A)
technicalPerformance: Equipped with busbar detection, glue line detection and junction box detection functions to automatically identify defective products and alarm
Self-developed deep learning vision system to realize accurate positioning and installation of junction box
Compatible with ordered/unordered junction box feeding methods, high compatibility, fast cycle time, can be connected with AGV and overhead shuttle to realize unmanned intellectualization

WV-XH13A.name: Junction Box Laser Welding Machine (WV-XH13A)
technicalPerformance: Adopts brand-new laser welding process, pioneering the application of laser technology in the field of junction box welding
Laser fusion welding realizes solder-free welding with higher welding strength
Equipped with high-precision automatic positioning by CCD before welding to achieve accurate welding
Equipped with high-precision in-welding and post-welding detection functions to accurately identify cold welding
Welding pressure block has the function of bending and leveling busbars with better compatibility
The overall layout of the equipment is reasonable, easy to debug and maintain

WV-XH06A.name: Junction Box High-Frequency Welding Machine (WV-XH06A)
technicalPerformance: Adopts visual positioning and full servo drive control
Features high capacity, high compatibility and high stability
Equipped with pressure detection and displacement detection
Automatic welding head cleaning
Multiple welding head specifications such as split welding head and integrated welding head are available for selection
Equipped with water leakage detection function

productParameters.Module & Junction Box Positioning Method: Module four-point alignment by servo drive, junction box positioning by CCD

WV-XH09A.name: Junction Box Hot Press Welding Machine (WV-XH09A)
technicalPerformance: Adopts high-efficiency welding system and dynamic vision tracking design to improve machine stability
Precise Temperature Control: Each welding point is controlled independently, and each heating body does not affect each other to ensure accurate temperature control

productParameters.Module & Junction Box Positioning Method: Module four-point alignment by servo/cylinder drive, junction box positioning by CCD

WV-KG02.name: Junction Box Cover Pressing Machine (WV-KG02)
technicalPerformance: Realizes automatic junction box cover pressing
Adopts vacuum detection, visual inspection and other methods to detect the cover pressing effect of junction box
Vibrating disk feeding is compatible with various junction box covers with large storage capacity
Manipulator for material picking and placing with high cover pressing accuracy
Supports multiple cover pressing methods such as oblique insertion and flat cover
Easy version switching

productParameters.Power Supply: Single-phase 220V, 50HZ, three-wire system (1 live wire, 1 neutral wire, 1 ground wire), incoming line specification 3×2.5mm
productParameters.Module & Junction Box Positioning Method: Module four-point alignment by servo drive, junction box positioning by CCD

WV-TB03A.name: Labeling Machine (WV-TB03A)
technicalPerformance: Power platform assists label tearing to improve label output integrity rate
Label receiving platform assists barcode output to increase label output stability
Pre-scanning + in-equipment supplementary scanning function with scanning success rate >99.9%
Driven by multiple servo motion axes for easy debugging and version switching
U-axis adopts stepping rotation with high precision, easy debugging and stable operation
Multiple optional functions such as visual inspection and three-code verification
